name: Voy
description:
Voy is a 2D Platformer in which the Player has to traverse several levels with the help of a grappling hook. 

At the moment only one level exists as a prototype for the full game.

Controls: A, D:Move Left/RightLeft Mouse Button:Grappling HookRight Mouse Button:Grappling Hook SwingW, S:Climb Up/Down while GrapplingS:Drop through Semisolid Platform Credits: Programmers:

Schwoens
luaul
b.jm021
